item.title: Foreman openidc SSO with keycloak
item.description: I this post I will show you how you can configure Foreman to use Keycloak asz an OIDC SSO authentication provider.

item.title: Free sso for Mattermost Teams Edition
item.description: In this article I will show you how to use Keycloak as an authentication provider for Mattermost Teams Edition.
